mn140:2.1: viharemu āvesane → viharāma āvesane (bj) | viharāma nivesane (s1-3, km) | viharāmāvesane (pts1) | viharemu nivesane (mr)
mn140:6.2: mamañca khvāyaṃ → mamaṃ khvāyaṃ (bj, s1-3, km) | maṃ khvāyaṃ (pts1)
mn140:8.3: Chayimā, bhikkhu, dhātuyo → etthantare pāṭho sī, pā1 potthakesu
mn140:19.2: Tena ca viññāṇena kiṃ → tena viññāṇena kiñci (s1-3, pts1)
mn140:20.2: sudhantaṃ niddhantaṃ → etthantare pāṭho syā1-3 potthakesu
mn140:35.2: vibbhantā gāvī → bhantagāvī (sī1, pā1), vibhantagāvī (ka-sī), gāvī (syā1-3, kaṃ)
mn140:36.4: vihesesi → viheṭhesi (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | viheseti (mr)
